content: अर्णव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Being agitated, foaming, restless (<ab>Ved.</ab>); full of water (<ls>Sāy.</ls>). --वः [अर्णांसि संति यस्मिन्, अर्णस्-व सलोपः <ls>P. V. 2. 109</ls> <ab>Vārt.</ab>] {@--1@} A stream, flood, wave. {@--2@} The (foaming) sea, ocean (<ab>fig.</ab> also); शोक° ocean of grief; so चिंता°; जन° ocean of men; संसारार्णवलंघन <ls>Bh. 3. 10.</ls> {@--3@} The ocean of air. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a metre. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the sun or Indra (as givers of water).
